#include<iostream>
#include <climits>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;
int v[501],w[501],dp[500000];


main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int e,f,i,j,n,maxi=100000000;
        cin>>e>>f;
        int x = f-e;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>v[i]>>w[i];

		    for(i=1;i<=x;i++)
            {
                dp[i]=maxi;
                for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
                {
                    if(w[j]<=i)
                    {
                        if(dp[i-w[j]]+v[j]<dp[i])
                           dp[i]= dp[i-w[j]]+v[j];
                    }
                }
            }
              if(dp[x] < maxi)
            printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n", dp[x]);
        else
            printf("This is impossible.\n");








    }



}
